  max-height: none !important;
  opacity: 1 !important;
  overflow: visible !important;
  transition: none !important;
	display: block !important;
}
.state_report .report-appendices .appendix .appendix__contents.accordion-section {
  height: auto !important;
	display: block !important;
}
.state_report .accordion-title span svg {
  display: none;
}
.state_report .report .report__content__inner .accordion-title, .state_report .report .report-appendices .accordion-title {
  pointer-events: none;
}
#cookie-notification { margin: 0 0 22px 0; }
.error404 main ul li:nth-last-child(-n+2) { display: none; }



.postid-297355 .entry-content .wp-block-image{
	margin:30px 0;
}

.postid-297355 .wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-24.wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-24{
	margin: 30px 0;
}

.postid-297355 .wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-44.wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-44{
	margin:30px 0;
}

.postid-297355 .wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-30.wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-30 {
	margin:30px 0;
}

.postid-297355 .wp-block-columns.alignfull {
    margin: 30px 0;
}
.page.page-child div.entry-content ol li a:hover {   
	transform: none;
}
.page.page-child .entry-content ol li a {
  display: inline;
}
.state_report-template-default.single.single-state_report.postid-566477 .report__content__inner.entry-content p b {
  font-weight: normal !important;
}
.report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body ul li:before {
background: #0a314d;
  color: #0a314d;
  content: "";
  display: block;
  height: .4em;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: .6em;
  transform: rotate(45deg);
  width: .4em;
}
.report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body > ul > li, .report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body > ol > li {
  list-style: none;
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding-left: 30px;
  position: relative;
}

.post-559404 .report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body ul li:before{
	display:none;
}

.post-559404 .report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body > ul > li, .report__content__inner.entry-content div.section_body > ol > li{
	 list-style-type: lower-roman;
}
.error404 {

	.site {
		background: url('../images/wavy-bg.jpg') 0 0 repeat;
	}

	.site-main {
		padding: 90px 0;
	}

	.headline--404 {
		margin-bottom: 16px;
	}

	.copy--404 {
		max-width: 730px;

		a {
			@include global-link;
		}
	}
}

.archive-404 {
	background-color: #0a314d !important;
    border: 0;
    color: #fff !important;
   // cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
    letter-spacing: 1.5px;
    padding: 22px 45px;
	text-decoration: none;;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    transition: background-color .2s;
	width: auto;

	@include breakpoint(get-breakpoint('md')) {
		width: auto;
	}
}

#query {
	font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
	height: 57px;
	letter-spacing: 1.5px;
	margin-right: 10px;
	padding: 5px 15px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	width: 100%;
	max-width:500px;

	&::placeholder {
		color: $color--empress;
	}
	

	@include breakpoint(get-breakpoint('md')) {
		max-width: 500px;
	}
}

#submit {
	margin-top: 20px;
	text-align: center;

	@include breakpoint(get-breakpoint('md')) {
		margin-top: 0;
		width: auto;
	}
}
.state-term-former-message{
	max-width: 750px;
	margin: 20px auto;
}

.button--outline-red{
	margin-bottom: 0;
}

.country-area-hero-block .module--notice-travel .notice-travel__travel {
  display: none;
}		</style>

span.icon-svg, span.icon-svg svg {
    width: auto;
}
.wmpci-popup-wrp.splash {
    background: hsla( 217, 17%, 66%, 0.6 );
}

.wmpci-popup-body {
    max-width: 750px;
}

.wpmci-popup-cnt-inr-wrp {
    box-shadow: 0 0 17px 5px hsla(0, 0%, 12%, 0.2);
    padding: 0;
}
.nav__overlay {
  min-height: 0 !important;
}
.dos_popup_header {
    height: auto;
    width: 100%;
}

.wpmci-popup-cnt-inr-wrp h2 {
    background: linear-gradient( to bottom, #062135 0, #062135 68px, #0a324c 68px, #0a324c 100% );
    color: #fff !important;
    font-family: "EB Garamond", Times, Serif;
    font-size: 20px;
    height: 168px;
    margin-bottom: 60px !important;
    padding-top: 111px;
    position: relative;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.wpmci-popup-cnt-inr-wrp h2 em {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 0.25em;
    text-transform: none;
}

.wpmci-popup-cnt-inr-wrp h2::before {
    background: center / contain no-repeat url('/wp-content/themes/state/images/state-favicon.png');
    content: '';
    display: block;
    height: 70px;
    left: 50%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 19px;
    transform: translateX( -50% );
    width: 70px;
}

.wpmci-popup-cnt-inr-wrp h4 {
    color: #0a314d !important;
    font-family: "EB Garamond", Times, Serif;
    font-size: 36px;
    font-weight: 400;
    letter-spacing: -0.5px;

				(function() {

					/*	check if webfonts are disabled by user setting via cookie - or user must opt in.	*/
					var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
					var cookie_check = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-needs-opt-in') >= 0 || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-can-opt-out') >= 0;
					var allow_continue = true;
					var silent_accept_cookie = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-user-silent-accept') >= 0;

					if( cookie_check && ! silent_accept_cookie )
					{
						if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaCookieConsent/) || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-session-refused') >= 0 )
						{
							allow_continue = false;
						}
						else
						{
							if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyRefuseCookiesHideBar/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyEssentialCookiesEnabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyGoogleWebfontsDisabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
						}
					}

					if( allow_continue )
					{
						var f = document.createElement('link');

						f.type 	= 'text/css';
						f.rel 	= 'stylesheet';
						f.href 	= 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat&display=auto';
						f.id 	= 'avia-google-webfont';

						document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(f);
					}
				})();

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

				(function() {

					/*	check if webfonts are disabled by user setting via cookie - or user must opt in.	*/
					var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
					var cookie_check = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-needs-opt-in') >= 0 || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-can-opt-out') >= 0;
					var allow_continue = true;
					var silent_accept_cookie = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-user-silent-accept') >= 0;

					if( cookie_check && ! silent_accept_cookie )
					{
						if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaCookieConsent/) || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-session-refused') >= 0 )
						{
							allow_continue = false;
						}
						else
						{
							if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyRefuseCookiesHideBar/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyEssentialCookiesEnabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyGoogleWebfontsDisabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
						}
					}

					{
						var f = document.createElement('link');

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

			<script type='text/javascript'>

				(function() {

					/*	check if webfonts are disabled by user setting via cookie - or user must opt in.	*/
					var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
					var cookie_check = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-needs-opt-in') >= 0 || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-can-opt-out') >= 0;
					var allow_continue = true;
					var silent_accept_cookie = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-user-silent-accept') >= 0;

					if( cookie_check && ! silent_accept_cookie )
					{
						if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaCookieConsent/) || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-session-refused') >= 0 )
						{
							allow_continue = false;
						}
						else
						{
							if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyRefuseCookiesHideBar/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyEssentialCookiesEnabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyGoogleWebfontsDisabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
						}
					}

					if( allow_continue )
					{
						var f = document.createElement('link');

						f.type 	= 'text/css';
						f.rel 	= 'stylesheet';
						f.href 	= 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat&display=auto';
						f.id 	= 'avia-google-webfont';

						document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(f);
					}
				})();

			</script>

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

				(function() {

					/*	check if webfonts are disabled by user setting via cookie - or user must opt in.	*/
					var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
					var cookie_check = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-needs-opt-in') >= 0 || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-can-opt-out') >= 0;
					var allow_continue = true;
					var silent_accept_cookie = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-user-silent-accept') >= 0;

					if( cookie_check && ! silent_accept_cookie )
					{
						if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaCookieConsent/) || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-session-refused') >= 0 )
						{
							allow_continue = false;
						}
						else
						{
							if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyRefuseCookiesHideBar/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyEssentialCookiesEnabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyGoogleWebfontsDisabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
						}
					}

					if( allow_continue )
					{
						var f = document.createElement('link');

						f.type 	= 'text/css';
						f.rel 	= 'stylesheet';
						f.href 	= 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat&display=auto';
						f.id 	= 'avia-google-webfont';

						document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(f);
					}
				})();

<style id='filebird-block-filebird-gallery-style-inline-css' type='text/css'>
ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery{margin:auto!important;padding:0!important;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:20px;align-items:stretch;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--columns),1fr);justify-items:stretch}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-grid li img{border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:2px 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:100%;max-width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry{-moz-column-count:var(--columns);-moz-column-gap:var(--space);column-gap:var(--space);-moz-column-width:var(--min-width);columns:var(--min-width) var(--columns);display:block;overflow:auto}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery.layout-masonry li{margin-bottom:var(--space)}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li{list-style:none}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure{height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;width:100%}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption{background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.3) 70%,transparent);bottom:0;box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;font-size:.8em;margin:0;max-height:100%;overflow:auto;padding:3em .77em .7em;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:100%;z-index:2}ul.filebird-block-filebird-gallery li figure figcaption a{color:inherit}

</style>

U.S.- CHINA | ECONOMIC and SECURITY REVIEW COMMISSION

U.S.-China Economic AND Security Review Commission

  • About Us
    About the Commission

    The U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission is a legislative branch commission created by the United States Congress in October 2000 with the legislative mandate to monitor, investigate, and submit to Congress an annual report on the national security implications of the bilateral trade and economic relationship between the United States and the People’s Republic of China, and to provide recommendations, where appropriate, to Congress for legislative and administrative action.

    Research

    The U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission is chartered to monitor, investigate, and report to Congress on the national security implications of the bilateral trade and economic relationship between the United States and the People’s Republic of China. The Commission meets its research mission by submitting to Congress an Annual Report, as well as by conducting staff-led reports, contracted research, and more.

China’s Position on Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine

08/31/2025
Body

China’s Position on Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine

Key Events and Statements from February 21, 2022 through August 31, 2025

Below is a list of key actions and statements summarizing China’s official position on Russia’s unprovoked invasion of Ukraine, which began on February 24, 2022. Items highlighted include China’s official government statements, press conferences, messages to the international community, media publications, and where available, leaked internal Chinese Communist Party (CCP) guidance for media and propaganda outlets.

(For a Timeline of key events in the lead up to the February 21, 2022, Russian invasion of Ukraine, visit https://www.uscc.gov/research/china-russia-interactions-leading-invasion-ukraine)

Entries are organized into the following categories:

  • [Action]: Chinese government activity which impacts the conflict in Ukraine
  • [Sanctions]: Chinese efforts to undermine international sanctions on Russia
  • [Statement]: Statements by Chinese government officials on the Ukraine conflict
  • [Media]: Chinese media stories reflecting official positions and censorship guidelines
  • [Event]: Major international events involving China, Russia, and Ukraine

[Timeline in reverse order, most recent event on top]

August 29, 2025

  • [Statement] When asked about Russia’s recent strikes on Kyiv that killed more than 20 people, China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Guo Jiakun does not directly condemn the strikes, but reiterates China’s “three principles of no expansion of the battlefield, no escalation of the fighting, and no party adding fuel to the flames.”

August 28, 2025

  • [Sanctions] For the first time, a tanker carrying liquified natural gas from the U.S.-sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 plant in Russia docked at a Chinese terminal.

August 25, 2025

  • [Statement] For the first time since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, General Secretary of the CCP Xi Jinping sends a congratulatory message to Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Ukraine’s Independence Day. While Zelenskyy posted Xi’s message on social media, China’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs declined to confirm whether Xi had sent the message. 

August 20, 2025

  • [Statement] Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskyy states that he does not consider China to be a potential security guarantor for a peace deal with Russia due to China’s lack of support for Ukraine and its ongoing supply of drones to Russia. In response, China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Mao Ning says that China remains willing to play a “constructive role” in promoting a resolution to the war. 

August 13, 2025

  • [Action] In response to new EU sanctions on two Chinese banks for providing “crypto asset services” to Russia, China’s Ministry of Commerce announces retaliatory sanctions on two Lithuanian banks, UAB Urbo Bankas and AB Mano Bankas.  

August 8, 2025

  • [Sanctions] In response to comments by U.S. President Donald Trump that the United States could impose additional tariffs on China for purchasing sanctioned Russian oil, China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Guo Jiakun says that all of China’s trade with Russia is “legitimate and legal.”
  • [Statement] During a call with General Secretary of the CCP Xi Jinping, Russia’s President Vladimir Putin shares Russia’s views on the current state of the Ukraine crisis and recent discussions with the United States. Xi says that China is pleased to see ongoing U.S.-Russia communication and efforts to promote a political settlement of the Ukraine crisis. 

August 6, 2025

  • [Statement] In a call with Chief Advisor to the President of Brazil Celso Amorim, China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi states that discussions on ending Russia’s war in Ukraine are at a critical moment. Wang Yi further says that China and Brazil can continue playing a role in promoting a political resolution to the crisis and building consensus among “Global South” countries in favor of a ceasefire.

July 27, 2025

  • [Sanctions] Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskyy sanctions 53 individuals and entities accused of supporting Russia’s defense industry, including some Chinese nationals and companies. China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Guo Jiakun criticizes the sanctions and urges Ukraine to “correct its mistake immediately.” 

July 25, 2025

  • [Event] The UN Security Council holds a briefing during which the U.S. and Chinese representatives exchange recriminations regarding Russia’s war in Ukraine. Acting U.S. Representative to the UN Dorothy Shea urges China to stop providing Russia with dual-use goods that enable its drone and missile attacks in Ukraine. In response, China’s Deputy Ambassador to the UN Geng Shuang criticizes the United States for “spreading lies” about China and “creating divisions” on the Ukraine issue.

July 23, 2025

  • [Sanctions] According to Reuters, Chinese companies are covertly shipping engines to Russian state-owned weapons manufacturer IEMZ Kupol by falsely labeling them as “industrial refrigeration units” to evade Western sanctions. These shipments have enabled IEMZ Kupol to increase production of its Garpiya-A1 attack drone, which has been used to attack military and civilian targets in Ukraine.

July 13, 2025

  • [Statement] On the sidelines of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization meeting in Beijing, China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi meets with Russia’s Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov to exchange views on the war in Ukraine, among other issues.

July 9, 2025

  • [Action] The Security Service of Ukraine arrests two Chinese nationals, a father and son, for allegedly spying on Ukraine’s Neptune anti-ship missile program, which is critical to Ukraine’s coastal defense against the Russian navy. China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Mao Ning states that China is “still confirming the relevant information” and will “protect the legal rights and interests of Chinese citizens.”

July 2, 2025

  • [Statement] China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi tells European Union officials that Beijing does not want a Russian loss in Ukraine because the United States might then shift its entire focus toward China. In a subsequent press conference, China’s Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Mao Ning states that a prolonged conflict in Ukraine is not in any party’s interests.
documents.title: China’s Position on Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine

U.S.- CHINA | ECONOMIC and SECURITY REVIEW COMMISSION

U.S.-China Economic AND Security Review Commission

  • About Us
    About the Commission

    The U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission is a legislative branch commission created by the United States Congress in October 2000 with the legislative mandate to monitor, investigate, and submit to Congress an annual report on the national security implications of the bilateral trade and economic relationship between the United States and the People’s Republic of China, and to provide recommendations, where appropriate, to Congress for legislative and administrative action.

    About the Commission

  • Research
    Research

    The U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission is chartered to monitor, investigate, and report to Congress on the national security implications of the bilateral trade and economic relationship between the United States and the People’s Republic of China. The Commission meets its research mission by submitting to Congress an Annual Report, as well as by conducting staff-led reports, contracted research, and more.

Made in China 2025—Who Is Winning?

AGENDA

Hearing on "Made in China 2025—Who Is Winning?"

Thursday, February 6, 2025

Dirksen Senate Office Building, Room 562, and Webex

Unable to see this video? Click here.

Hearing Co-Chairs: Vice Chair Randall Schriver [Opening Statement] and Commissioner Michael Kuiken [Opening Statement]

9:30 AM – 9:40 AM: Co-Chairs' Opening Remarks
 
9:40 AM – 11:10 AM: Panel I: Scorecard on Made in China 2025

  • Drew Endy, Science and Senior Fellow, Hoover Institution and Martin Family Fellow in Undergraduate Education, Stanford University [Testimony]
  • Richard Aboulafia, Managing Director, AeroDynamic Advisory [Testimony]
  • Sunny Cheung, Fellow for China Studies, Jamestown Foundation [Testimony]

11:10 AM – 11:20 AM: Break

11:20 AM – 1:00 PM: Panel II: The Next Decade of U.S.-China Tech Competition

  • Tim Khang, Director of Global Intelligence, Strider Technologies [Testimony]
  • Emily de La Bruyère, Co-Founder, Horizon Advisory and Senior Fellow, Foundation for Defense of Democracies [Testimony]
  • Hanna Dohmen, Research Analyst, Georgetown University Center for Security and Emerging Technology (CSET) [Testimony]
  • David Lin, Senior Director for Future Technology Platforms, Special Competitive Studies Project [Testimony]

1:00 PM – 1:50 PM: Lunch Break

1:50 PM – 3:20 PM: Panel III: Effectiveness of Beijing’s Approach to Innovation

  • Liza Tobin, Managing Director, Garnaut Global and Senior Fellow, Jamestown Foundation [Testimony]
  • Barry Naughton, So Kwan Lok Chair of Chinese International Affairs, School of Global Policy and Strategy, University of California San Diego [Testimony]
  • Kyle Chan, Postdoctoral Research Associate, Princeton University [Testimony]

3:20 PM – 3:25 PM: Closing Remarks

3:25 PM: Adjourn
